sentences.sContent: I am sometimes described as a naturalist.
sentences.sContent_eng: I am sometimes described as a naturalist.
sentences.sCn: 有时我也被称作自然主义者。

sentences.sContent: An American naturalist wrote:"a patriot must always be ready to defend his country against its government".
sentences.sContent_eng: An American naturalist wrote:"a patriot must always be ready to defend his country against its government".
sentences.sCn: 一位美国自然主义者写道：“爱国者要随时准备好为了保卫国家而与政府斗争！”

sentences.sContent: To illustrate this, let me refer to the naturalist science of the 19th century, and the effects it had on our opinions of life.
sentences.sContent_eng: To illustrate this, let me refer to the naturalist science of the 19th century, and the effects it had on our opinions of life.
sentences.sCn: 为了诠释这点，我要引用下19世纪的自然主义科学及其它对我们的生活观念所产生的影响。

synos.tran: 自然主义者；博物学者；（英）动物标本剥制者；买卖玩赏动物的商人
自然的（等于naturalistic）；自然主义的；博物学的

words.tran: 自然的；物质的；天生的；不做作的
自然的；自然主义的；博物学的
归化的；入籍的；[动] 自然化的；驯化的
自然的事情；白痴；本位音
自然主义；本能行动；自然论
对自然现象的崇拜；裸体主义
使自然化；接受…入国籍；采纳（naturalize的过去式和过去分词）
